generator.irlworld.info: Use online databases to recreate the earth!
irlwworldgui.title: IRLW World customization
irlwworldgui.spawn_picking: Click to pick a spawn point (or not, this is still in early dev)
irlwtokengui.title: Mapbox API token
irlwtokengui.text1: The IRL World mod uses mapbox geographic API to generate the real World
irlwtokengui.text2: You need to create a free mapbox account here:
irlwtokengui.text4: Then go to the account section, to API Access token and generate a token.
irlwtokengui.notsafe: IRLW hasn't been able to safely handle this problem, clicking quit will crash the game
irlwtokengui.ignorehover: This will disable the mod until you manually change the token in the config.
irlwtokengui.ignorehover.running: The integrated server will be stopped.
command.goto.error.poscompute: IRLW Failed to calculate the new position because of an internal error, check the game's log for more information.
command.goto.error.tp: IRLW Failed to teleport you to your new position because of an internal error, check the game's log for more information.
item.world_map.name: World Map
